title: Exposure Biomarker Profiles of Polycyclic Aromatic Hydrocarbons Based on A Rat Model Using A Versatile Analytical Framework
content:
Environ. Sci.: Processes Impacts, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EM00109E, Paper
Xiaoqian Jia, Manman Long, Yiming Pang, Hang An, Yu Jin, Jianjun Jiang, Z. W. Li, Bin Wang
Polycyclic aromatic hydrocarbons (PAHs) are an important group of organic toxic pollutants. Parent PAHs (pPAHs) are mainly metabolized into mono-hydroxylated PAHs (OH-PAHs) after entering human body. Until now, it is...
